title: Mohamed Aboutrika
summary: Mohamed Mohamed Mohamed AbouTrika (Arabic: محمد محمد محمد ابوتريكة‎; born 7 November 1978) is an Egyptian retired professional footballer who played as an attacking midfielder and a forward. He is often considered one of the best Egyptian players in history. He came second in the African Footballer of the Year award in 2008 after Emmanuel Adebayor, and was one of five nominees for the 2006 award, and one of the ten nominated for the 2013 award.
